# resolve(in:)

**Instance Method**

Resolve to a concrete modifier in the given `environment`.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func resolve(in environment: EnvironmentValues) -> Self.ResolvedModifier
```

## Resolving a modifier

- **ResolvedModifier**: The type of modifier to use after being resolved.

items.description: The type of modifier to use after being resolved.
